title: Черная богиня
overview: In a small southern Russian city, scorched by the hot sun and washed by the gentle sea, a beautiful woman lives carelessly, who does not even suspect how fragile her little world is. Overnight, she loses everything: her beloved husband, well-being and peace. Everyday life filled with quiet happiness is replaced by terrible shocks. But in the whirlpool of events, she does not bend, does not lose her humanity, but on the contrary, hitherto unknown forces are revealed in her, allowing her to regain herself and love...
